entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Timmins Victor Power Airport 6:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 37 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: NNW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
